mapper.insert: INSERT INTO player(playerName, teamId, position, createDate) VALUES(#{playerName}, #{teamId}, #{position}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, (SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM player WHERE playerName < p.playerName) AS no, t.teamName, p.playerName, p.position, p.createDate FROM player p INNER JOIN team t ON p.teamId = t.id ORDER BY no
SELECT p.id, t.teamName, p.playerName, p.position, p.createDate FROM player p INNER JOIN team t ON p.teamId = t.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE player SET playerName = #{playerName}, teamId = #{teamId}, position = #{position} WHERE id = #{id}
